text: The Mussard cave (French: Caverne Mussard) is a mountain cave on the island of Réunion. Located about 2150 meters above sea level in the heart of the , it falls within the municipality of Saint- Benoit.http://www.hikr.org/dir/Caverne_Mussard_48971/ Website for Hiking Reports Caverne Mussard It is named after the slave hunter , who have killed and captured a lot of Maroons in the mid eighteenth century.Patrick Beaton, Six Months in Reunion: A Clergyman's Holiday, and how He Passed it , Hurst and Blackett, 1860, p293. == Notes and references == Category:Caves of Africa Category:Lava caves Category:Réunion National Park
title: Mussard cave
